meanings.definition: To hit or strike with a blow.
meanings.sent1: He was boffing the ball with his bat.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally boffed her elbow on the table.
meanings.sent3: The clown was boffing the balloon, trying to keep it in the air.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm was boffing the trees with strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The hammer was boffing the nail into the wood.

meanings.sent1: The characters in the movie were boffing behind closed doors.
meanings.sent2: Some birds were boffing in the trees during mating season.
meanings.sent3: The rabbits were caught boffing in the garden, much to the surprise of the children.
meanings.sent4: The waves were boffing the shore relentlessly during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The fire was boffing the logs, crackling and popping in the fireplace.
